entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Onefour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Onefour AAFC 08:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: NW 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h late this evening then northeast 40 gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
